summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1985 TOYOTA 4RUNNER RANGER RV ROGUE (NA).  WHILE DRIVING 35 MPH, THE REAR WHEEL ASSEMBLY DETACHED FROM THE VEHICLE AND CAUSED $6,200 WORTH OF DAMAGE.  THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED.  THE CONTACT REFERENCED NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 85V089000 (WHEELS:CENTER SECTION).  HE WOULD LIKE TO KNOW HOW TO REACH THE MANUFACTURER, RANGER INDUSTRIES INC.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 77,000.  UPDATED 05/27/09.  *LJ  UPDATED 05/28/09.*JB
